title: Rebekah Rhodes' Journey with Auto-Immune Disease
itunes:title: Rebekah Rhodes' Journey with Auto-Immune Disease
description: In this episode of the Pioneering Today Podcast, Rebekah Rhodes and I are discussing all things thyroid health. We both share our individual thyroid journeys as well as some of the things we've done to help heal, as well as what we're doing currently to stay in the best health possible. For all of the show notes and links, visit https://melissaknorris.com/342.
